main.name: Arman Gupta
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Driven and detail-oriented software developer with hands-on experience in crafting high-performance applications and optimizing computational models. Proficient in Java, Kotlin, C++, and advanced frameworks such as Spring Boot, with a strong foundation in computer science and a knack for innovative solutions.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out if you're looking for a passionate software developer to join your team or collaborate on exciting projects. Let's create something amazing together!

education.school: Indian Institute of Technology, Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India
St. Joseph's Sr. Sec. School, NTPC, Auraiya, Uttar Pradesh, India
St. Joseph's Sr. Sec. School, NTPC, Auraiya, Uttar Pradesh, India

work.title: App Developer Intern
work.description: Developed the Yoga Simulation Application MOKSHA using Kotlin, XML, and Firebase, enhancing the experience for 12% of daily yoga practitioners in India. Designed a Yoga Pose Detection Model with Firebase ML Kit, achieving 97.4% accuracy in analyzing user movements.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Led the development of a high-performance computational fluid dynamics (CFD) solver using C++, CUDA, and OpenMP. Optimized streaming operations and enhanced computational efficiency by 80%, achieving double the performance improvements in CFD simulations.

work.title: Undergraduate Research Intern
work.description: Implemented a large-scale matrix multiplication model with OpenMP, resulting in a 50x performance improvement on a 39-core system. Conducted benchmark tests on parallel computing frameworks, showcasing OpenMP's dominance with a 5% performance edge over oneTBB.

testimonials.text: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
